content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: PushFullZone path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/dns/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/zones/{zone_id}/repush content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name zoneid
desc a dns zone id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum publish a zone
desc push a zone to stackpaths dns infrastructure
responses
title: 37_Zones_PushFullZone_215.json
